text: Shallum the son of Kore, the son of Ebiasaph, the son of Korah, and his brothers, of his fatherâ€™s house, the Korahites, were over the work of the service, keepers of the thresholds of the tent: and their fathers had been over the camp of Yahweh, keepers of the entry.
name: I Chronicles 9:19
